channel.title: Mathjax on The Amateur Data Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in Mathjax on The Amateur Data Scientist

item.title: Sliding a Ladder and Filling a Bowl
item.description: Sliding Ladder Problem Solution Filling a Bowl Problem Solution References Sliding Ladder Problem Problem 116, Page 142 in Simmons (2016) A ladder 20 ft long is leaning against a wall 12 ft high, with its top projecting over the wall. Its bottom is being pulled away from the wall at the constant rate of 5 ft/min. Find how rapidly the top of the ladder is approaching the ground:

item.title: Deriving the Quotient Rule from the Product Rule
item.description: From Product to Quotient Product Rule of Differentiation Quotient Rule of Differentiation Derive the Quotient Rule from the Product Rule Problems Extend the Product Rule and Prove Tangent Lines Intersecting on a Curve Reference From Product to Quotient I have always had a hard time remembering the quotient rule for derivatives. I do not know how I remembered it while studying calculus, but today I learned from Simmons (2016) that I can derive it from the product rule.
